price: 52.Nummah Nabiyow ama korosuh kol oobisne Qhuraan kitab keenih bahne, ama kitaabak addal eneyyi ittam baxxaqqa hayne Ni ixxigal, yeemene marah tirtoo kee Racmat yakkemkeh.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰهُم بِكِتَٰبٖ فَصَّلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ji'nāhum bikitābin faṣṣalnāhu ʿalā ʿil'min hudan waraḥmatan liqawmin yu'minūna
